name: Metro Mover
description:
Welcome to Blueton Underground Rail!

We have an underground system with one line with plans for future expansions. We use trains with easy to use controls however it might take some time to master the stopping point at the platform.

Training Available

The best way to start your career at BUR is with a training session. If completed successfully it will give you a general knowledge of driving a train in the system. It will also raise your rank from Driver Trainee to Driver Level 1.

Signal System

An automatic signalling system keeps the trains on the right route and safely separated. Remember to stop at red signals and keep the speed limits to not activate the automatic emergency stop.

The People of Blueton

Everyday citizens and visitors of Blueton uses the metro system. They enter and exit both platforms and trains. Use the station camera to make sure there is no passengers in the danger zone when closing the doors.

An Expanding Subway System

There is currently one line. However, the council of Blueton has confirmed one more line and is discussing extensions to already existing lines.
